mapper.select: select * from MEMBER ORDER BY memNo DESC
mapper.insert: insert into member (memName, memNickName, memId, memPw) values(#{memName},#{memNickName},#{memId},#{memPw} )
mapper.select: select memId, memNickName, memName, memPw, regdate from member where memId = #{memId}
mapper.update: update member set memName = #{memName}, memNickName = #{memNickName}, memPw = #{memPw} where memId = #{memId}
